publication.title: 3D Mapping of Surface Temperature Using Thermal Stereo
publication.jconf: International Conference on Control, Automation, Robotics and Vision

publication.title: A semisupervised approach to space carving
publication.abstract: In this paper, we present a semi-supervised approach to space carving by casting the recov- ery of volumetric data from multiple views into an evidence combining setting. The method presented here is statistical in nature and employs, as a sta rting point, a manually obtained contour. By making use of this user-provided information, we obtain probabilistic silhouettes of all successive
